hero.title: AI-powered video recap
hero.subtitle: Transform long videos into concise summaries automatically.
hero.subtitle2: Save time with AI-generated transcripts and key insights.

features.title: All-in-one platform for film & anime recaps

movieRecap.title: Movie & Series Recap
movieRecap.description: Compress full-length movies and multi-episode arcs into tight recaps with beats, chapters, and timelines the fandom can jump through instantly.

autoSubs.title: Auto Subs & Summaries
autoSubs.description: Generate subtitles plus concise summaries for anime, K-drama, Hollywood, or local films - ready to share or embed in wikis and threads.

highlightScenes.title: Highlight Scenes
highlightScenes.description: Detect standout scenes automatically - battles, plot twists, OST drops - then clip and caption them for shorts and reels.

multiPlatform.title: Multi-platform Exports
multiPlatform.description: Export once for YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, and Facebook with subs burned in and aspect ratios tuned for trailers, teasers, and episodic recaps.

packages.title: Service Packages
packages.subtitle: Choose the service package that fits your needs

scriptGeneration.title: Standard
scriptGeneration.subtitle: Script Generation
scriptGeneration.description: Generate scripts for entire video recaps and summaries from user-uploaded sources.
features: Automatic content analysis and summarization
Detailed script creation for video recaps
Multi-language support

scriptVoice.title: Pro
scriptVoice.subtitle: Script + Voice
scriptVoice.description: Generate scripts for entire video recaps and summaries from user-uploaded sources, with diverse customizable voices as desired.
features: All features of Script Generation package
Natural, diverse voice reading
Customize voice reading as desired
Support for multiple languages and accents

fullService.title: Ultra
fullService.subtitle: Full Service
fullService.description: Complete the entire video recap process from start to finish. Users only need to upload input and wait (with some customization options) and receive the product.
features: All features of Script + Voice package
Complete video processing from start to finish
Automatic high-quality video recap creation
Customize some parts according to needs
Export ready-to-use videos

workflow.label: Workflow
workflow.title: Every film. Every episode. Recaps everywhere.
workflow.description: Bring every movie, anime episode, and drama into one view. Puzzle auto-transcribes, builds plot chapters, tags character moments, and ships clips ready for your social feeds and fan communities.
features: Sync uploads from Netflix rips, Blu-ray dumps, or studio screeners and search across subtitles instantly.
Chapters, highlights, and reels generated with captions - no manual trimming or timecodes for long-form films.
Export once for YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, and Facebook with aspect ratios tuned for teasers, trailers, and episodic recaps.

models.label: Models
models.title: Work faster with models tuned for film, anime, and drama.
models.description: Puzzle blends a plot-aware LLM, multilingual ASR, and vision models to detect scenes, understand character arcs, and surface the beats fans care about. Export ready-to-share clips with subs and context baked in.
features: Vision models tag fights, kisses, reveals, and OST drops as scenes for instant reels.
Multilingual ASR keeps JP/EN/VI/KR subs aligned for global audiences.
Plot-aware LLM writes synopses, episode arcs, and character beats you can drop into wikis.

voice.label: Voice
voice.title: Multilingual voiceovers. Natural, studio-grade.
voice.description: Puzzle layers top-tier TTS models for EN, JP, VI, KR, and more, so every recap ships with natural pacing, emotion, and lip-sync-friendly timing. Swap voices without re-editing the timeline.
features: Pick from leading TTS stacks (Neural, diffusion, crossover) tuned for anime, drama, and trailers.
Instant language switch for EN/JP/VI/KR/ES with accent controls and SSML for emphasis.
Auto-align voiceovers to your timeline cuts - no manual nudge or re-render.

quality.label: Quality
quality.title: Pristine output. Original resolution preserved.
quality.description: Recaps keep the source sharpness with frame-accurate trims. Set export presets for trailers, reels, or full recaps without sacrificing bitrate or aspect fidelity.
features: Export up to 4K with original bitrate or lock to custom targets.
Pick aspect ratios (16:9, 9:16, 1:1, 4:5) and safe margins without re-editing.
Burn-in captions optional; keep clean masters for archival and re-renders.

notFound.title: 404 - Page Not Found
notFound.message: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't exist.
notFound.description: The page might have been moved, deleted, or you entered the wrong URL.
